en: The factory has been transferred to Hokkaido.
zh: 工厂已经转移到北海道了。

en: Factories have been urged to switch from coal to a cleaner fuel.
zh: 已经敦促各工厂从煤炭转向更清洁的燃料。

en: The factory had to cut back its production.
zh: 工厂不得不削减产量。

en: The factory is keyed to produce men's wear.
zh: 这家工厂专门生产男装。

en: The factory was shut down ten years ago.
zh: 这家工厂十年前就倒闭了。

en: A factory is not suitable for a residential district.
zh: 工厂不适合建在住宅区。

en: The factory is running at full capacity.
zh: 工厂正在全负荷运转。

en: These factories are a blot on the landscape.

en: The area of the factory is 1,000 square meters.
zh: 工厂的面积是1000平方米。

en: They decided to shut down the factory.

en: Factory waste sometimes pollutes our rivers.
zh: 工厂的废料有时会污染我们的河流。

en: The plant supervisor said to his crew, "Let's knock off for lunch."
zh: 车间主管对他的员工说：“我们去吃午饭吧。”

en: Many men were hired at the factory.
zh: 许多人在工厂被雇佣。

en: The news of the fire in the factory caused a sensation.
zh: 工厂发生火灾的消息引起了轰动。

en: The plants manufacture complex chemical compounds.
zh: 这些工厂生产复杂的化合物。

en: The factory did not want him.
zh: 工厂不想要他。

en: The smoke from factories hung over the town.

en: The construction work is steadily nearing completion.
zh: 建筑工程正在稳步接近完工。

en: Industrialization had a great influence on the development of the economy in Japan.
zh: 工业化对日本经济的发展产生了巨大的影响。

en: More students are interested in finance than in industry.
zh: 对金融感兴趣的学生比对工业感兴趣的学生多。

en: When one would be filial, one's parents are gone.
zh: 树欲静而风不止，子欲养而亲不待。

en: The sayings of Confucius are famous.

en: We've had a long spell of fine weather.

en: Fine weather added to the joy of our trip.
zh: 好天气增加了我们旅行的乐趣。

en: Thanks to the nice weather, we were able to harvest all of the crops in a day.

en: The good weather sent the price of vegetables down.

en: A spell of fine weather enabled us to get the harvest in safely.

en: Happy events tend to be accompanied by problems.

en: Good times alternate with bad.

en: This is a golden opportunity we'd be stupid to pass up. Let's get to work and finish it all in one fell swoop.
zh: 这是一个千载难逢的机会，我们要是错过了就太傻了。让我们开始工作，一举完成。

en: Opportunity seldom knocks twice.

en: I opened the box out of curiosity.

en: Good luck alternates with misfortune.

en: Fortune beamed on him.

en: Thanks, though. I appreciate it.

en: You have to do it, whether you like it or not.

en: My throat hurts.

zh: 在惊险的赛车比赛中，车手们为了领先，常常把自己置于进退两难的境地。

en: The man walking over there is our teacher.

en: I expect you can tell from the quoted text, but this is a book written in a colloquial style.
zh: 我想你可以从引用的文字中看出来，这是一本用口语风格写的书。

en: You must not talk with your mouth full.

en: Honey in the mouth and poison in the heart.
zh: 口蜜腹剑

en: Do not talk with your mouth full.

en: Let's drive to the lake.
zh: 我们开车去湖边吧。

en: We would run down to the lake and jump in.
zh: 我们会跑到湖边，然后跳进去。

en: The lake is surrounded by green hills.
zh: 湖泊被青山环绕。

en: The lake is about 25 meters deep.
zh: 湖大约有25米深。

en: The lake was gleaming in the bright sunshine.
zh: 在明媚的阳光下，湖面闪闪发光。

en: The lake was bound in ice.
zh: 湖面结冰了。

en: The lake was beautiful with some swans swimming on it.
zh: 湖很美，有一些天鹅在上面游泳。

en: The lake was frozen, so we walked across the ice.
zh: 湖面结冰了，所以我们从冰上走过去。

en: The lake was frozen.
zh: 湖面结冰了。

en: The lake is three miles across.
zh: 湖面宽三英里。

en: The lake is calm, with some swans swimming on it.
zh: 湖面平静，有一些天鹅在上面游动。

en: The lake is deepest around here.
zh: 湖在这里最深。

en: The lake is deepest here.
zh: 湖在这里最深。

en: The lake is a long way from here.
zh: 湖离这里很远。

en: The ice on the lake couldn't bear his weight.
zh: 湖上的冰承受不住他的重量。

en: In the middle of the lake lies the island.
zh: 湖中央坐落着那个岛屿。

en: How deep is the lake?
zh: 这个湖有多深？

en: They shoot them off over the lake.
zh: 他们把它们射到湖面上空。

en: There were some boats on the lake.
zh: 湖上有一些船。

en: Last night, Mizuki was completely drunk and she was walking along the lake, and then she fell in the water.
zh: 昨晚，瑞希完全喝醉了，她在湖边走着，然后她掉进水里了。

en: Last night Mizuki, very drunk, fell into the water while walking along the lakeside.
zh: 昨晚瑞希喝得酩酊大醉，在湖边散步时不小心掉进了水里。

en: The house by the lake is mine.
zh: 湖边的房子是我的。

en: There lives an old man in the hut by the lake.
zh: 湖边的小屋里住着一位老人。

en: The old church by the lake is very beautiful.
zh: 湖边的老教堂非常漂亮。

en: The lake is deep here.
zh: 这里的湖很深。

en: The boats on the lake make a beautiful scene.
zh: 湖上的船只构成了一幅美丽的画面。

en: We could see the reflection of the mountains in the lake.
zh: 我们能看到湖中群山的倒影。

en: We'll go to the lake to have lunch.
zh: 我们去湖边吃午饭吧。

en: There was thin ice on the lake.
zh: 湖面上有薄冰。

en: We had our vacation at the lake.
zh: 我们在湖边度假。

en: There were hundreds of birds on the lake.
zh: 湖上有数百只鸟。

en: May I swim in the lake?
zh: 我可以下湖游泳吗？

en: I'd like to take it easy riding in a rowboat - just the two of us.
zh: 我想轻松地划着小船，就我们两个人。

en: The lake was adjacent to his house.
zh: 湖紧挨着他的房子。

en: The fog was rising from the lake.
zh: 雾从湖面升起。

en: A fund was launched to set up a monument in memory of the dead man.
zh: 设立基金是为了建立一座纪念死者的纪念碑。

en: A monument has been erected to the memory of the deceased.
zh: 已经建立了一座纪念碑来纪念逝者。

en: A monument was erected in memory of the deceased.
zh: 为了纪念逝者，建立了一座纪念碑。

en: The trouble may lie in the engine.
zh: 问题可能出在发动机上。

en: The trouble lies in the engine.
zh: 问题出在发动机上。

en: It seems out of order.
zh: 它好像坏了。

en: The trouble lay in the engine.
zh: 问题出在发动机上。

en: How I long for a sight of my native land!
zh: 我多么渴望看到我的祖国啊！

en: How I long for a sight of my native land.
zh: 我多么渴望看到我的祖国啊。

en: When we are away from home, nothing gives us more pleasure than to receive a parcel from home.
zh: 当我们远离家乡时，收到家里的包裹是最令人高兴的事情。

en: Mr Kawabata writes a letter home every year.
zh: 川端先生每年都给家里写信。

en: I'll bring you up to date with hometown news.
zh: 我会告诉你最新的家乡消息。

en: Don't forget to bolt the door.
zh: 别忘了把门闩上。

en: I looked in the cupboard.
zh: 我看了看橱柜。

en: All of the money in the cupboard was stolen.
zh: 橱柜里的所有钱都被偷了。

en: Mr Togawa was nominated for mayor.
zh: 户川先生被提名为市长候选人。

en: There is a man waiting for you at the door.
zh: 有一个人在门口等你。

en: Who is the girl at the door?
zh: 门口的那个女孩是谁？

en: Who's the girl at the door?
zh: 门口的那个女孩是谁？

en: It is dark out of doors.
zh: 户外很黑。

en: Take exercises out of doors.
zh: 在户外做运动。

en: Exercise outdoors.
zh: 在户外锻炼。

en: Go exercise outside.
zh: 去外面锻炼。

en: Close the door.
zh: 关门。

en: Be kind enough to shut the door.
zh: 请您关上门。

en: Please shut the door.
zh: 请把门关上。

en: Please close the door.
zh: 请把门关上。

en: Close the door please.
zh: 请关门。

en: You'd better shut the door.
zh: 你最好把门关上。

en: I heard a knock at the door.
zh: 我听到了敲门声。

en: I tried to open the door, but I couldn't as it was locked.
zh: 我试着打开门，但是打不开，因为它锁着。

en: I tried to open the door, but I couldn't because it was locked.
zh: 我试着打开门，但是打不开，因为它锁着。

en: I tried to open the door, but I couldn't since it was locked.
zh: 我试着打开门，但是打不开，因为它锁着。

en: Open the door and let in the dog.
zh: 打开门，让狗进来。

en: Open the door and let the dog in.
zh: 打开门，让狗进来。

en: Hold the door.
zh: 扶住门。

en: The door bolts on the inside.
zh: 门从里面闩上了。

en: The door opens from within.
zh: 这扇门从里面打开。

en: The door opened by itself.
zh: 门自己开了。

en: Lock the door without fail.
zh: 务必锁上门！

en: Lock the door!
zh: 锁门！

en: There was a new coat of paint on the door.
zh: 门上刷了一层新油漆。

en: The door blew open.
zh: 门被风吹开了。

en: The door suddenly opening, she sprang to her feet.
zh: 门突然打开，她猛地站了起来。

en: I heard the door open.
zh: 我听到了开门声。

en: To know oneself is not easy.
zh: 认识自己不容易。

en: Don't judge others by yourself.
zh: 不要以己度人。

en: Nothing is more important than this: to know yourself.
zh: 没有什么比这更重要：认识你自己。

en: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you.
zh: 己所不欲，勿施于人。

en: Know who you are.
zh: 了解你是谁。

en: Some people enjoy solitude.
zh: 有些人享受独处。

en: Isolation is the common lot of man.
zh: 孤独是人类共同的命运。

en: Many times I've been alone.
zh: 很多时候我都是独自一人。

en: The lonely patient derives pleasure from sewing.
zh: 孤独的病人从缝纫中获得乐趣。

en: We shouldn't confuse solitude with isolation. They are two separate things.
zh: 我们不应该把独处和孤独混淆。它们是两件不同的事情。

en: The orphan children were told to behave themselves.
zh: 孤儿们被告知要规矩一点。

en: The fund was set up to help orphans.
zh: 该基金的设立是为了帮助孤儿。

en: Being an orphan, my father had to start earning money at ten.
zh: 因为是个孤儿，我父亲十岁就开始挣钱了。

en: The orphan met up with his two sisters when he was five years old.
zh: 这个孤儿在五岁时与他的两个姐妹相遇。

en: He put up a brave and lone struggle, but up against such heavy odds he couldn't get his business plan accepted.
zh: 他进行了勇敢而孤独的斗争，但面对如此巨大的困难，他的商业计划未能被接受。

en: Water in a solid state is called ice.
zh: 固态的水叫做冰。

en: When a solid melts, it becomes liquid.
zh: 当固体融化时，它会变成液体。

en: Leave it in the refrigerator until it sets.
zh: 把它放在冰箱里直到凝固。

en: Don't eat hard foods.
zh: 不要吃硬的食物。

en: I have hard stools.
zh: 我大便干燥。

en: You don't have to be so formal.
zh: 你不必这么拘谨。

en: A man who asks his wife's permission before taking any action except breathing is a henpecked husband.
zh: 一个男人在采取任何行动（除了呼吸）之前都要征得妻子的同意，他就是一个妻管严的丈夫。

en: Is he breathing?
zh: 他在呼吸吗？

en: I have difficulty breathing.
zh: 我呼吸困难。

en: I'd like to page someone.
zh: 我想呼叫某人。

en: What's the name of the person you want paged?
zh: 您要呼叫的人叫什么名字？

en: Can you page someone for me?
zh: 你能帮我呼叫某人吗？

en: Reading classics is not easy.
zh: 阅读经典作品并不容易。

en: I like shopping in used-book stores and in used-clothing shops.
zh: 我喜欢在旧书店和二手服装店购物。

en: It is worthwhile reading classical works of literature.
zh: 阅读古典文学作品是值得的。

en: New facts about ancient China have recently come to light.
zh: 关于古代中国的新事实最近已经显露出来。

en: I wish I could see the ancient world.
zh: 我希望我能看到古代世界。

en: The ancients conceived of the world as flat.
zh: 古人认为世界是平的。

en: Some ancient people thought of the sun as their God.
zh: 一些古代人认为太阳是他们的神。

en: The ancients believed the earth was flat.
zh: 古人相信地球是平的。

en: The ancient Romans founded colonies throughout Europe.
zh: 古罗马人在整个欧洲建立了殖民地。

en: In ancient Rome, the bodyguards who surrounded the wealthy and powerful to protect them when they walked the streets, were called satellites.
zh: 在古罗马，当富人和有权势的人走在街上时，为了保护他们而围绕在他们周围的保镖被称为卫星。

en: Ancient astronomers noticed constellations and gave them names.
zh: 古代天文学家注意到了星座并给它们命名。

en: Ancient astronomers did not have instruments to help them see objects in the sky.
zh: 古代天文学家没有仪器来帮助他们看到天空中的物体。

en: Salt was a rare and costly commodity in ancient times.
zh: 在古代，盐是一种稀有且昂贵的商品。

en: In ancient times, plagues killed many people.
zh: 在古代，瘟疫杀死了许多人。

en: The ancient Greeks knew as much about the solar system as we do.
zh: 古希腊人对太阳系的了解和我们一样多。

en: In the days of the ancient Incas, it was the largest city in America.
zh: 在古代印加时代，它是美洲最大的城市。

en: The old guard was nearly voted out of the Upper House.
zh: 老卫队几乎被上议院投票出局。

en: He is the bravest soldier that ever lived.
zh: 他是最勇敢的士兵。

en: No matter where in the world or when, a parent's love for a child is the same.
zh: 无论在世界的哪个地方或何时，父母对孩子的爱都是一样的。

en: In all times and places many examples of poor relations between wives and mothers-in-law can be seen.
zh: 在任何时代和地点，都可以看到许多婆媳关系不良的例子。

en: He is as brave a man as ever breathed.
zh: 他是个非常勇敢的人。

en: The good old days are gone never to return.
zh: 美好的旧时光一去不复返了。

en: He sent his old clothes home for his brothers, and sent his family money, too.
zh: 他把旧衣服寄回家给他的兄弟们，也给家里寄了钱。

en: An old wooden box served as table.
zh: 一个旧木箱当桌子用。

en: It's no use trying to stick to the old ways.
zh: 试图坚持旧方法是没有用的。

en: The old method proved to be best after all.
zh: 事实证明，旧方法毕竟是最好的。

en: I was ashamed to go out in old clothes.
zh: 我不好意思穿旧衣服出去。

en: Exchange the old part for a new one.
zh: 用新的零件更换旧的零件。

en: Old traditions are crumbling away.
zh: 旧的传统正在瓦解。

en: Should old acquaintance be forgot, And never brought to mind?
zh: 岂能忘记旧日朋友，心中能不怀想？

en: An old belief is sometimes still widely current.
zh: 一种古老的信仰有时仍然很流行。

en: I'll discard my old jacket.
zh: 我要扔掉我的旧夹克。

en: I ran across his telephone number in an old address book of mine.
zh: 我在我的旧地址簿里偶然发现了他的电话号码。

en: I was looking at old pictures.
zh: 我在看旧照片。

en: This bicycle is old, but it's better than nothing.
zh: 这辆自行车很旧，但总比没有好。

en: They decided to pull down the old building.
zh: 他们决定拆除旧建筑。

en: The old church stands north of the town.
zh: 老教堂位于城镇的北部。

en: As compared with the old model, this is far easier to handle.
zh: 与旧型号相比，这款更容易操作。

en: Compared with the old model, this is far easier to handle.
zh: 与旧型号相比，这款更容易操作。

en: Old homes, especially traditional Japanese ones, can be damp and unfriendly to modern life.
zh: 老房子，尤其是传统的日式住宅，可能潮湿，对现代生活不太友好。

en: The old house was taken down.
zh: 老房子被拆除了。

en: The old house was demolished.
zh: 老房子被拆毁了。

en: In many old movies the heroine is always the one to die.
zh: 在许多老电影中，女主角总是那个死去的人。

en: I'll put the old bridge back.
zh: 我会把旧桥放回去。

en: It's an old piano.
zh: 这是一架旧钢琴。

en: The old television set went for 10 dollars.
zh: 那台旧电视机卖了10美元。

en: An antique pot was dug out.
zh: 一个古董罐子被挖掘出来了。

en: Replace the old tires with new ones.
zh: 用新的轮胎替换旧的轮胎。

en: I disposed of my old coat.
zh: 我处理掉了我的旧外套。

en: Older carpets are more valuable than newer carpets.
zh: 旧地毯比新地毯更有价值。

en: An old castle stands near the river.
zh: 一座古老的城堡矗立在河边。

en: There are many old Indian legends.
zh: 有很多古老的印第安传说。

en: Personally, I don't think it makes any difference who wins the election.
zh: 就我个人而言，我认为谁赢得选举没有任何区别。

en: Don't take it personally.
zh: 别往心里去。

en: You shouldn't ask personal questions.
zh: 你不应该问私人问题。

en: Might I ask you a personal question?
zh: 我可以问你一个私人问题吗？

en: Can I ask you a personal question?
zh: 我可以问你一个私人问题吗？

en: May I ask you a personal question?
zh: 我可以问你一个私人问题吗？

en: It's better for you to keep out of private affairs.
zh: 你最好不要干涉私事。

en: The buying and selling of peoples' personal information is becoming a big issue.
zh: 买卖个人信息正成为一个大问题。

en: Disposable income is what counts for the level of personal consumption.
zh: 可支配收入是衡量个人消费水平的标准。

en: In a country where individualism is more common, personal objections to smoking in public are usually respected.
zh: 在一个个人主义更为普遍的国家，公众通常会尊重个人对在公共场所吸烟的反对。

en: The individual is the fundamental element of a community.
zh: 个人是社区的基本要素。

en: Individuals do not exist for the development of the State.
zh: 个人的存在不是为了国家的发展。

en: Each individual is different.
zh: 每个人都是不同的。

en: The deceased was eighty years old.
zh: 死者享年八十岁。

en: Private charity is only a drop in the bucket.
zh: 私人慈善只是杯水车薪。

en: We must respect individual liberty.
zh: 我们必须尊重个人自由。

en: The rights of the individual are the most important rights in a free society.
zh: 在自由社会中，个人权利是最重要的权利。

en: We must respect the will of the individual.
zh: 我们必须尊重个人的意愿。

en: It is our policy not to give out personal information.
zh: 我们的政策是不泄露个人信息。

en: An individual has rights and responsibilities.
zh: 个人有权利和责任。

en: I'd like to reserve a private compartment.
zh: 我想预订一个私人包厢。

en: Single or double room?
zh: 单人间还是双人间？

en: You get to see the wood only when it becomes too difficult to distinguish individual trees.
zh: 只有当难以区分单棵树木时，你才能看到整片森林。

en: You can win all the battles yet lose the war.
zh: 你可以赢得所有的战斗，却输掉整场战争。

en: Keep on swimming up to your limit.
zh: 坚持游泳，直到你的极限。

en: I wonder if there is any meaning to putting proverbs into English.
zh: 我想知道把谚语翻译成英语有什么意义。

en: I wonder if there is any point in translating proverbs into English.
zh: 我不知道将谚语翻译成英语是否有意义。

en: Proverbs are still very popular in America.
zh: 谚语在美国仍然非常流行。

en: As the saying goes, "Nothing ventured, nothing gained."
zh: 正如谚语所说，“不入虎穴，焉得虎子”。

en: It is no use crying over spilt milk, as the proverb says.
zh: 正如谚语所说，覆水难收。

en: As the proverb goes, "The end justifies the means."
zh: 正如谚语所说，“为了达到目的，可以不择手段”。

en: The proverb says that what is done cannot be undone.
zh: 谚语说，木已成舟，无法挽回。

en: Freedom of speech is now taken as a matter of course.
zh: 言论自由现在被认为是理所当然的事情。

en: Freedom of speech is taken as a matter of course.
zh: 言论自由被认为是理所当然的。

en: Many advantages accrue to society from the freedom of speech.
zh: 社会从言论自由中获得许多好处。

en: Freedom of speech was tightly restricted.
zh: 言论自由受到严格限制。

en: Freedom of speech is restricted in some countries.
zh: 在一些国家，言论自由受到限制。

en: Put in a good word for me.
zh: 替我说几句好话。

en: You should always be careful in your speech.
zh: 你说话时应该总是小心谨慎。

en: You can't separate language from culture.
zh: 你不能将语言与文化分开。

en: To give a definition of word is more difficult than to give an illustration of its usage.
zh: 给一个词下定义比举例说明它的用法更难。

en: It is said that man is different from other animals in that man uses language.
zh: 据说人与其它动物的区别在于人使用语言。

en: It is wrong to divide language into "living" and "dead".
zh: 将语言分为“活的”和“死的”是错误的。

en: Language is a means of communication.
zh: 语言是一种交流工具。

en: Language is the means by which people communicate with others.
zh: 语言是人们与他人交流的手段。

en: The word became flesh and lived for a while among us.
zh: 道成了肉身，住在我们中间。

en: Words may pass but blows fall heavy.
zh: 言语可能会过去，但打击却很沉重。

en: Language keeps in step with the times.
zh: 语言与时俱进。

en: A word spoken at the wrong time can do very much more harm than good.
zh: 在错误的时间说出的话造成的伤害可能比好处大得多。

en: Words serve to express ideas.
zh: 文字用来表达思想。

en: Words stand for ideas.
zh: 文字代表思想。

en: Language is a fundamental problem of international marriage.
zh: 语言是跨国婚姻的一个根本问题。

en: Words travel across the universe.
zh: 文字穿越宇宙。

en: Language is one of the most important ways of communication.
zh: 语言是最重要的沟通方式之一。

en: Words, when well chosen, have such great force in them.
zh: 用词得当，便具有巨大的力量。

en: In spite of the language difficulty, we soon became friends.
zh: 尽管有语言障碍，我们很快成为了朋友。

en: In the world of words, the imagination is one of the forces of nature.
zh: 在文字的世界里，想象力是大自然的力量之一。

en: Repetition plays an important role in language study.
zh: 重复在语言学习中起着重要的作用。

en: Please show me the meaning of word.
zh: 请告诉我这个词的意思。

en: The meaning of words can change according to their context.
zh: 词语的意义会根据语境而改变。

en: You had better consult a dictionary when you don't know the meaning of a word.
zh: 当你不知道一个词的意思时，你最好查一下字典。

en: You should consult a dictionary when you don't know the meaning of a word.
zh: 当你不知道一个词的意思时，你应该查一下字典。

en: Her accent gave her away.
zh: 她的口音暴露了她的身份。

en: His accent betrays him to be a Frenchman.
zh: 他的口音暴露了他是个法国人。

en: Try to motivate kids with verbal praise.
zh: 试着用口头表扬来激励孩子们。

en: Watch your mouth!
zh: 注意你的言辞！

en: He told me to be careful in speech.
zh: 他告诉我说话要小心。

en: I would define, in brief, the poetry of words as the Rhythmical Creation of Beauty.
zh: 我会简要地将文字的诗歌定义为有节奏的美的创造。

en: Emotion counts above vocabulary in verbal communication.
zh: 在口头交流中，情感比词汇量更重要。

en: Watch out for your tongue.
zh: 小心你的舌头。

en: Saying is one thing, and doing is quite another.
zh: 说是一回事，做又是另一回事。

en: Words cannot convey my true feelings.
zh: 言语无法表达我真实的感受。

en: Words cannot convey my feelings.
zh: 言语无法表达我的感受。

en: I can't quite explain it, but I believe I've caught a glimpse of the differences between Japanese and American cultures and lifestyles.
zh: 我说不太清楚，但我相信我已经瞥见了日本和美国文化和生活方式之间的差异。

en: Words cannot express it.
zh: 言语无法表达。

en: Watch your language.
zh: 注意你的语言。

en: I am at a loss for words.
zh: 我无语了。

en: The words are on the tip of my tongue, but I don't quite know how to put what I want to say.
zh: 话就在嘴边，但我不太知道该怎么表达我想说的。

en: The words are on the tip of my tongue, but I don't quite know how to say what I want to say.
zh: 话就在嘴边，但我不太知道该怎么说我想说的。

en: But for language, there would be no thought.
zh: 如果没有语言，就不会有思想。

en: I could never be a true man of my word.
zh: 我永远无法成为一个真正信守诺言的人。

en: Linguistic competence is inborn, not acquired.
zh: 语言能力是天生的，不是后天习得的。

en: Ability to talk distinguishes human beings from animals.
zh: 说话的能力将人类与动物区分开来。

en: Language acquisition requires creativity.
zh: 语言习得需要创造力。

en: The linguist is quite familiar with the dialect.
zh: 这位语言学家非常熟悉这种方言。

en: Some consider language as a form of knowledge.
zh: 有些人认为语言是一种知识形式。

en: Some children learn languages easily and others with difficulty.
zh: 有些孩子学语言很容易，有些孩子学起来很困难。

en: Language is one of man's most important inventions.
zh: 语言是人类最重要的发明之一。

en: Language is unique to man.
zh: 语言是人类独有的。

en: Language is an indispensable instrument of human society.
zh: 语言是人类社会不可或缺的工具。

en: Language is a specifically human characteristic.
zh: 语言是人类特有的特征。

en: Language is a vehicle of human thought.
zh: 语言是人类思想的载体。

en: Language is peculiar to man.
zh: 语言是人类特有的。

en: Language changes as human beings do.
zh: 语言随着人类的变化而变化。

en: Language is unique in that any statement must start out as the creation of an individual mind.
zh: 语言的独特之处在于，任何陈述都必须首先是个人思想的创造。

en: Language enable us to communicate with other people.
zh: 语言使我们能够与他人交流。

en: We communicate with one another by means of language.
zh: 我们通过语言相互交流。

en: I like languages.
zh: 我喜欢语言。

en: There are many guesses about how language began, but the fact is that no one really knows.
zh: 关于语言是如何开始的有很多猜测，但事实是，没有人真正知道。

en: You must read between the lines.
zh: 你必须理解字里行间的意思。

en: If you read between the lines, this letter is a request for money.
zh: 如果你理解字里行间的意思，这封信就是一封要钱的请求。

en: Please read between the lines.
zh: 请注意言外之意。

en: Do as you're told to do.
zh: 让你怎么做就怎么做。

en: Do it as you are told.
zh: 按你被告知的去做。

en: Do as you are told.
zh: 让你怎么做就怎么做。

en: Do as you're told.
zh: 让你怎么做就怎么做。

en: Silence is golden.
zh: 沉默是金。

en: Save your breath.
zh: 省省吧。

en: You should keep your mouth shut.
zh: 你应该闭嘴。

en: Am I making myself clear?
zh: 我说清楚了吗？

en: Do you understand what I'm saying?
zh: 你明白我的意思吗？

en: Why don't you say it?
zh: 你为什么不说出来？

en: You cannot take back what you have said.
zh: 覆水难收。

en: There are some things you can say and some things you can't.
zh: 有些话你能说，有些话你不能说。

en: Come on out with it.
zh: 说出来吧。

en: My lips are sealed.
zh: 我不会说的。

en: I told you before!
zh: 我之前跟你说过了！

en: It is difficult to put what we said in practice.
zh: 要把我们说的话付诸实践是很困难的。

en: If you ask me, reading comics is a complete waste of time.
zh: 依我看，看漫画完全是浪费时间。

en: To say is one thing, and to do is another.
zh: 说是一回事，做又是另一回事。

en: Don't speak unless you have something worth saying.
zh: 除非你有值得说的话，否则就别说话。

en: Needless to say, he is right.
zh: 不用说，他是对的。

en: Needless to say, because of the accident, he will stay away from school for a while.
zh: 不用说，因为这次事故，他会暂时离开学校一段时间。

en: It is needless to say that you are to blame.
zh: 不用说，你该为此负责。

en: Obviously, the server load will increase as a result.
zh: 很明显，服务器负载会因此增加。

en: Needless to say, I've come here to help you.
zh: 不用说，我来这里是为了帮助你。

en: Needless to say, he could not get the prize.
zh: 不用说，他没能得到那个奖。

en: It goes without saying that every one is bound to obey the law.
zh: 不言而喻，每个人都必须遵守法律。

en: Needless to say, getting up early is important.
zh: 不用说，早起很重要。

en: Needless to say, fear of war has to be handed down.
zh: 不用说，对战争的恐惧需要传承下去。

en: Needless to say, health is more important than wealth.
zh: 不用说，健康比财富更重要。

en: It goes without saying that experience is a good teacher.
zh: 不言而喻，经验是一位好老师。

en: It goes without saying military discipline is literally rigid.
zh: 不言而喻，军队纪律非常严格。

en: It goes without saying that Rome was not built in a day.
zh: 不言而喻，罗马不是一天建成的。

en: Needless to say, he did not win the prize.
zh: 不用说，他没有赢得那个奖。

en: Needless to say, health is above wealth.
zh: 不用说，健康比财富更重要。

en: It goes without saying that the ideology is behind the times.
zh: 不言而喻，这种意识形态已经过时了。

en: Needless to say, Judy came late as usual.
zh: 不用说，朱迪像往常一样迟到了。

en: Needless to say, he never came again.
zh: 不用说，他再也没来过。

en: Needless to say, he was late for school as usual.
zh: 不用说，他像往常一样上学迟到了。

en: Needless to say, Norway has become the world's second largest oil supplier.
zh: 不用说，挪威已经成为世界第二大石油供应国。

en: You should be careful what you say.
zh: 你应该小心你说的话。

en: Talking is one thing, doing is another.
zh: 说是一回事，做是另一回事。

en: Saying is one thing and doing another.
zh: 说是一回事，做又是另一回事。

en: Saying and doing are two different things.
zh: 说和做是两码事。

en: To say is one thing, to do is another.
zh: 说是一回事，做是另一回事。

en: Saying is quite different from doing.
zh: 说和做截然不同。

en: There is no use trying to excuse yourself.
zh: 试图为自己辩解是没有用的。

en: Don't just keep making excuses.
zh: 不要总是找借口。

en: State your case briefly.
zh: 简要陈述你的理由。

en: Settle the argument soon.
zh: 尽快解决争端。
